message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to reflect the impact inflation will have on my share in future rounds.

I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think we can find a split that better reflects the impact of inflation on both of us. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the faster depreciation of our share in subsequent rounds.
Bob, I understand your perspective. Let's meet in the middle. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This acknowledges the inflation impact while still being a reasonable compromise.
